channel.title: how to disable radioactive screen grain effect?
channel.description:
It's just way too out of place in a half life game for this to be here, and its also unrealistic.
Unchecking the "enable noise shader" box does not work.

item.title: how to disable radioactive screen grain effect?
item.dc:creator: SFJake
item.description:
Hate it myself, reported it in the bug section, no answer. I mean, it obviously is bug, the option should work.

Read full topic
